title: Lagging alot , and fps drops ...
body:
I need help! 
Im lagging alot on the tfs , randomlly!
I notice once that my CPU usage , in that momentos goes to 90 or more!
Can some one help me?

replies.body: League typically shouldn't be eating up 90% of your cpu usage, so I wonder if there might be something else eating up some of that space. Let's try running a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3) to make sure there aren't any other programs running in the background that might be slowing down your pc, but let me know how that works out!
Already done that all ... and steal doing the same

Alrighty, that helps to rule out a few things at least! Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and make sure to use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some logs first. Shoot those logs over to them and they'll be able to see what's going wrong!
